item.title: Render LaTeX using KaTeX
item.description: Enable katex by adding katex = "true" to the front matter +++ katex = "true" +++ It’s almost a dropin alternative to the mathjax solution,you should just choose one of them. Inline math looks like this This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} =1$ This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1$ and with math blocks: $$\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} =1$$ $$ \sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1 $$

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Budding Data Scientist with a sound foundation in Data Analytics and keen interest in Statistical Methods. Highly motivated to transform data into quantifiable, actionable insights through clear, representative visualizations and predictive models. Efficient independent learner and valuable team member.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Coursework Site – Coursework from various programming and AI courses at SUNY Oswego Give Me Credit – Predicting credit worthiness through past financial factors Molecular Classification Capstone – Classification of ALL vs AML cancer type through genetic differences
